# author_index
**Type:** Module
**Source:** [View source](bengal/bengal/cache/indexes/author_index.py#L1)

[bengal](/api/bengal/) ›[cache](/api/bengal/cache/) ›[indexes](/api/bengal/cache/indexes/) ›author_index

Author Index - Index pages by author.

## Classes




### `AuthorIndex`


**Inherits from:**`QueryIndex`Index pages by author.

Supports both string and dict author formats:
    author: "Jane Smith"

    # Or with details:
    author:
      name: "Jane Smith"
      email: "jane@example.com"
      bio: "Python enthusiast"

Provides O(1) lookup:
    site.indexes.author.get('Jane Smith')   # All posts by Jane

Multi-author support (multi-valued index):
    authors: ["Jane Smith", "Bob Jones"]    # Both authors get index entry
